content:
OK, so I scheduled the weekly design meetings -- but what should we talk about? I think the idea this week was to talk about the chalk-engine crate in more detail, continuing from last time.

I'm guessing Zoom would be good for this, somehow, so let's run with that.

I was imagining this would be a "lead-in" to the "non-enumerable predicates" topic that is scheduled for making progress during this sprint.
